item.content:encoded: Photo: Thomas Trutschel/Photothek via Getty Images No console, just cloud Update (July 9): On Monday, Xbox announced that the Xbox TV app has officially launched for owners of the applicable Amazon Fire TV Sticks. On June 27, Microsoft and Amazon announced a cloud gaming partnership that lets users with select Amazon Fire TV Sticks play Xbox games without a console. Instead, users can download the Xbox app on their Fire TV device, log in to their Microsoft account, and start playing right away...

item.description: Many modern mathematical proofs are a combination of conceptual arguments and technical calculations. There is something of a tradeoff between the two: one can add more conceptual arguments to try to ...
item.content:encoded: Many modern mathematical proofs are a combination of conceptual arguments and technical calculations. There is something of a tradeoff between the two: one can add more conceptual arguments to try to reduce the technical computations, or vice versa.
